column4: I am looking for a Netbook that plays games like Call of Duty the best one I found so far is a Dell MX-11 at $800.00 US
- anything with ion video card should work fine
Not sure whether to get that Dell MX-11 netbook or an Android phone ?
- well, it really depends on what you use it for..if you're mainly in to social networking and stuff, the android phone would be better imo
